io.micronaut.security.token.jwt.cookie

Class JwtCookieConfigurationProperties

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.micronaut.security.token.jwt.cookie.JwtCookieConfigurationProperties
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Toggleable, JwtCookieConfiguration

    @ConfigurationProperties(value="micronaut.security.token.jwt.cookie")
public class JwtCookieConfigurationProperties
extends Object
implements JwtCookieConfiguration
